description: Four men in cowboy attire sit around a campfire enjoying a meal from a large pot. One man is suddenly surprised to find a small green lizard in his bowl, holding it up on his spoon for the others to see. This discovery introduces an element of absurdism into the rustic setting. The reaction implies that the presence of the lizard is merely an oversight by the cook, rather than a cause for alarm. The scene highlights the unexpected and bizarre occurrences possible even in simple circumstances.
caption: "Well, I'll be! Eggbeater must have missed that one."
